sermons.title: GOD-A FATHER OF FAITHFULNESS
sermons.description: Does it seem like nothing is going right? Do your problems keep growing without any solution? This meditation is the testimony of someone who found herself in this situation and then experienced God as a Father of Faithfulness!  Kanaan is the home of the Evangelical Sisterhood of Mary, an international, interdenominational organization founded in 1947 within the framework of the German Evangelical (Protestant) Church. Website: www.kanaan.org
